from itertools import groupby
n=input()
for i in range(n):
    s=raw_input()
    l=list(s)
    li=[]
    for i in range(len(l)):
        x=ord(l[i])
        if (x>=65 and x<91) or (x>=97 and x<=123):
            li.append(l[i])
    li.sort()
    x=[]
    c=0
    for i,k in groupby(li):
        x.append(len(list(k)))
    for i in x:
        if (i%2)!=0:
            c+=(i/2)+1
        else:
            c+=i/2
    print c
